turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how are you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm good. I would like to order some coffee from Starbucks, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great what starbucks shall I order this with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one that's closest to me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you give me a cross street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From among mainstream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Main and 5th is the closest one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Yeah, I'll go with that one, then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What coffee did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking a venti black and white mocha with no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, and what milk did you want to use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2%'s fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and did you want it iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great and would you like any syrups?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, chocolate syrup, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. I'll go ahead and place an order for your venti iced black and white mocha with chocolate syrup, no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You'll get the reciept via text soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thanks a lot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: have a good day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
